description: This file initializes a vector database with a PDF knowledge base, creates an agent, and runs a query asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and handles responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface for PostgreSQL using pgvector.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response to a query, optionally in markdown.
